author: Staff Reporter
text:
Twelve residents of Venmani Nagar in Karamadai attempted immolation in front of the Coimbatore Collectorate on Monday.

Petition

According to sources, they went there to submit a petition seeking action against Karki who duped them by promising basic amenities in the Nagar.

The police personnel on duty foiled the immolation bid.

The residents said that they were living at Venmani Nagar for the last six years without road, power connection, and water. Karki had collected money from them promising to provide the facilities.

When they contacted him, they were threatened of dire consequences.

Though they they had represented the matter several times to the district administration and the police, no action had been taken.

On Sunday, Karki and his friends abused and threatened them saying that they would set fire to the residents’ huts.
title: Self-immolation bid foiled
